name: Hinriks Horror Game Fun Time Great Job
name_original: Hinriks Horror Game Fun Time Great Job
description:
Hinriks Horror Game Fun Time Great Job is first person puzzle platforming horror game. 

This game was a visual scripting assignment at my school Futuregames and was super fun to make.

Thanks to Marin Annader, Ali Hamad and Rickard Dahlberg for great course 

Hope you enjoy
